overview:
Focused on finding innovative ways to improve technology and business models, Tolga has enjoyed working with fellow entrepreneurs, technology teams and business development executives.

He was founder and CEO of high-tech ventures from idea stage through exit. Launched from his living room in California, Allesta later grew to become a multi million dollar venture, offering products and services to telecom and finance industry.

In addition being a serial entrepreneur, Tolga also acted as Business Development Executive, Chief Architect, and Architecture Board Chair for medium and large multi-national organizations.

He holds a Ph.D. in theoretical Physics, has multiple patents, authored articles in refereed journals, and contributing author of a book on data-mining.
